page.title: 20PLAYGROUND GAMES (2)
page.content:
Watch and Chain, Watch and Chain? Who has stole my Watch and Chain? My fair lady. " The children are marching through an arch made by two children holding hands. On the word "lady" the arch traps a child and everyone sings: "Off to prison you must go, you must go, you must go. Off to prison you must go, My fair lady" The child who is caught chooses to be a watch or a chain and stands behind the arch person who is a watch or a chain. When everyone has been caught there is a tug o' war.
Some games have interesting names like {Wall-ee, Short Line, Long Line, {Offground Tig, 1-2-3 & in, World Cup, {Hopscotch, Kit-Kat }and we also play fighting games like {Romans & Saxons.
